Uses of Interface
com.complexible.stardog.api.Connection

Packages that use Connection
com.complexible.stardog.api Provides the core SNARL (Stardog Native API for the RDF Language) classes and interfaces for programmatic access to the Stardog DBMS. 
com.complexible.stardog.api.impl   
com.complexible.stardog.api.search Provides classes and interfaces for performing free-text search over a Stardog database via the SNARL API. 
com.complexible.stardog.jena Provides classes for Stardog-Jena integration.
